title: The Labyrinth Raids of the Ultimate Tank - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Beautiful Female Lead   Dense Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Dungeons   Fantasy World   Guilds   Homunculus   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Saints   Shield User   Sister Complex   Special Abilities   Sword And Magic   Younger Sisters
author: Ryuta Kijima   木嶋隆太
description: Rude is a tank, known as the strongest in history. However, the Hero decided that his skills were worthless because he couldn’t do anything but take damage, and threw him out of the party. His cleric friend who trusted him followed him to the remote village that Rude was forced to return to.>
